trans-unit.resname: PSDC·1★ | Ajani, Caller of the Pride | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·1★ | Ajani, Caller of the Pride | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·1★ | Ajani, Caller of the Pride | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−8]: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens, where X is your life total.
trans-unit.target: [−8]: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens, where X is your life total.

trans-unit.target: Jace, Memory Adept

trans-unit.target: [+1]: Draw a card. Target player mills a card.

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·60★ | Jace, Memory Adept | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: [−7]: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·102★ | Liliana of the Dark Realms | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Liliana of the Dark Realms
trans-unit.target: Liliana of the Dark Realms

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·102★ | Liliana of the Dark Realms | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·102★ | Liliana of the Dark Realms | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: Target creature gets +X/+X or -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Swamps you control.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: Target creature gets +X/+X or -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·102★ | Liliana of the Dark Realms | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−6]: You get an emblem with "Swamps you control have '{T}: Add {B}{B}{B}{B}.'"
trans-unit.target: [−6]: You get an emblem with "Swamps you control have '{T}: Add {B}{B}{B}{B}.'"

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·132★ | Chandra, Pyromaster | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chandra, Pyromaster
trans-unit.target: Chandra, Pyromaster

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·132★ | Chandra, Pyromaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. That creature can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. That creature can't block this turn.

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·132★ | Chandra, Pyromaster | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [0]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
trans-unit.target: [0]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·132★ | Chandra, Pyromaster | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−7]: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: [−7]: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

trans-unit.target: [+1]: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·172★ | Garruk, Caller of Beasts | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−3]: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: PSDC·172★ | Garruk, Caller of Beasts | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle."
trans-unit.target: [−7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may search your library for a creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle."
